overview: One of the most unknown uprisings in our history, "El motín del pan", was led by women in the city of Córdoba during the month of May 1652. We do not know the faces or names of those women. There is no image. How to recover the gestures of resistance of those we have not been able to see?
tagline: How to recover the gestures of resistance of those we have not been able to see?
title: A Revolt Without Images
